title: LEAGUE CLIENT ALPHA LEAK?
body:
Well found a video today on You tube of the so calld Alpha client. **It coud be fake!**
However i whant to share it because it looks amazing and there is a lot of work behind it.

As a Riot employer farther below confirmed this is real footage of the new client! 
But please dont forget it is still in the alpha state and many things coud change till release.

replies.body: As we're getting closer to opening up sign-ups for the [League client update alpha test](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/client-update.html), we're conducting internal testing so we're prepped for players to participate in the alpha. This required use of a live, public environment, and we knew there was a chance of it being prematurely discovered. That's okay, and we'll be sharing much more context on the League client update and its alpha test as we get closer to the alpha's start, including some info on the PBE boards in the next week or so in regards to an upcoming tech test.
Make sure to invite Moobeat.

Pretty sure that he'll be close to first on the list. If not, Rito plz.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
An alpha?  Great!  Now that's 2 things I can apply to and never be accepted for.

~~what was the other one?~~
actually, better not ask that question
Probably the PBE.
Out of curiosity, is there any chance of the client being fullscreen like literally every other modern client?
I like it windowed. I'd be sad if it wasnt.
I like actually being able to multitask with the non-fullscreen client. Check my Web browser with the client right next to it? A-OK. Not having to hit Alt+Tab to do ANYTHING is the best part though.

> [{quoted}](name=BardEsNumeroUno,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lXqAhWBx,comment-id=000600020000,timestamp=2016-03-06T19:46:18.256+0000)
>
> I like it windowed. I'd be sad if it wasnt.

Same, what's the point of it being full screen?

This. There is nothing you can do in the client that requires it to be fullscreen, it's not like the game is loaded in the client afterwards so no reason to make it fullscreen. And since the x to exit doesn't work a lot, being able to rightclick it in the taskbar to close it is faster than alt tabbing then doing that.
I guess some people like it windowed, others would like it on fullscreen. Imo the best route to go, if possible, is to make an option to switch between windowed and fullscreen.
Yes Riot do this

The ability to leave the client open and do other things normally is one of the clients greatest advantages and without a doubt was a huge reason why League lasted so long for me because I could always just load it up and have it sit there and if friends decide to come on and have a game I was there ready and waiting unlike other games which i'd never load casually because fullscreen would be too disruptive. I wish the industry had picked this up more for MP dedicated games. I was actually excited for Battlelog until they announced it would run through your browser.

Honestly there's not all THAT much different about it so far from what is shown basically your login is now on the side, and everything is streamlined and all looks the same way now ... that modern style look. The new champ select however looked very nice and even better than the current champ select we have since the news and store tabs were greyed thats obviously something you guys still seem to be working on. But since you guys just updated the store on live I'm guessing that's prolly what we would get in the alpha to as it fits into that streamlined look.  

Overall I like the changes 8/10 in my book. A valiant effort. 
new champ select 10/10 really nice to see the full character portraits when choosing the champion.
the rest 7/10 not really much to say things are just placed differently but its not really a change or anything too special its just basic ui changes.

GJ tho riot I look forward to seeing this as it comes to live instead of being alpha im sure alot could still change.

and are you guys actually going to listen to us? if so then sign me up i already have alot to say. if not then i hope the leaders of riot will realize(before it's to late hopefully) that the current game is broken in a way that it seem that only the players can see so plz tell you higher ups that the players(the reason why games are made to begin with) are angry and are leaving in mass until they fix it.
